reviewText: MARVELOUS COLLECTION OF A TRUE SCIENTIST!!!

My daughter and my niece are both home-schooling their children.  They both are using the Bill Nye collection as part of their curriculum.

Children from ages 4 through 11 love this collection and then want to try some of the things they learn from the series.  Comments from both mothers "We hope that even more of the Bill Nye series are released for use...he's great!"

Excellent for classroom and home use.  Many great science labs that can be done in the classroom; kids LOVE these DVDs.  I wish more would be available in this format of 2 shows/DVD or more than 2 shows.  How to get Disney to release more episodes?
